casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Derrick D. BOGER 158P06-13 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 30, 2017 Derrick D. Boger, for Boger, Derrick D. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of May 2017 by Defendant for Writ for En Banc:

*376"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of May 2017."
